column4: Hi, i need help installing this font, i have extracted the .TFF files but idk what to do now, i'm using Jaunty
anyone please?
you need to move it into /usr/share/fonts/some folder

all fonts go to the location /usr/share/fonts
should i just paste them there?
inside there there are many other folders so the best way is to use the instructions from site where u got the fonts

that .fonts folder etc
